import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    num = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip()))
    f = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    for i in range(len(num)):
        num[i] = f[num[i] - 1]
    print(''.join(map(str, num)))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    num = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip()))
    f = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))
    for i in range(len(num)):
        num[i] = f[num[i]-1]
    print(''.join(map(str, num)))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = [0] + f

    for i in a:
        print(f[int(i)], end='')

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    f = [0] + f

    for i in range(n+1):
        a = a.replace(str(i), str(f[i]))

    a = ''.join(a)

    print(a)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
